org.apache.spark

Interface SharedSparkContext

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DoubleRDDSuite, GenericAvroSerializerSuite, InputOutputMetricsSuite, KryoSerializerAutoResetDisabledSuite, KryoSerializerSuite, PairRDDFunctionsSuite, PartitioningSuite, PartitionPruningRDDSuite, PartitionwiseSampledRDDSuite, PipedRDDSuite, ProactiveClosureSerializationSuite, RDDSuite, SortingSuite, ZippedPartitionsSuite

    public interface SharedSparkContext
    Shares a local `SparkContext` between all tests in a suite and closes it at the end
